official_title: To provide for the restoration of H.B. Plant Hall at the University of Tampa.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the restoration of the national historic landmark H.B. Plant Hall at the University of Tampa, Florida. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide for the restoration of H.B. Plant Hall at the University of Tampa.
